page.title: 13ON THE FARM
page.content: The Roffs own 140 acres of farmland. Also they own 3 tractors,a hay turner, two hay bailers,a muck spreader and a weed sprayer.They also own 170 ewes,7 rams,and 250 lambs,200 cattle,and 7 nurse cows and 1 dog.They own chickens but they are bantoms.They get the turkeys for christmas in July.The sheeps fly dipping starts in June and the sheep scab dipping is in July and one in september.The rams and ewes are kept in different fields so the farmer knows when the lambs are to arrive.The house used to have a moat around and it has a well in the garden. They moved to the farm in 1956 and the farmer gets up at quarter past six to feed the animals because,the animals have to be fed every day.The cattle and sheep are sold at Tring cattle market to be sold to butchers and other people.
